item.title: 从Word文件抽取数据导入到Excel文件
item.author: Spaceack
item.description: 1 2 3 pip3 install python-docx; pip3 install xlwl; 从docx抽取数据 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 import docx def get_docx(): from docx import Document path = "info.docx" document = Document(path) Lines = [] for paragraph in document.paragraphs: Lines.append(paragraph.text) return Lines 写入xls文件 1 2 3 4 5 6 import xlwt workbook = xlwt.Workbook(encoding =
